description: Information that describes a rule for the non-resource

nonResourceURLs.description: A set of partial URLs that a user should have access to. Wildcards ('`*`') are allowed, but only as the full, final step in the path. '`*`' means all.

verbs.description: A list of HTTP API verbs, like: `get`, `post`, `put`, `delete`, `patch`, `head`, `options`. '`*`' means all.
